ORIGAM Documentation : Condition Rule

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified on Oct 30, 2015

An XPath based rule that always returns a boolean value.

Input context: Full document. /ROOT/value in case of simple data types (string, integer etc.)

Used in

  • Sequential workflow task start rules
  • Data Structure rules conditions
  • Workflow page (API) Redirect action - ConditionRule
